summary.para: The collection of item types used in the game. Use it to avoid typos.

Specifies that the item is a food or a drink and can be consumed.
Examples: Fud, Beer, Ham Sandwich, Whiskey, Banana.

Specifies that the item can be consumed, but is not considered a food item.
Examples: First Aid Kit, Syringe, Cocktail, Cigarettes, Cologne.

Specifies that the item can be worn.
Examples: Bracelet of Strength, Bulletproof Vest, Soldier Helmet, Mood Ring, Mayor Badge.

Specifies that the item is a melee weapon.
Examples: Chloroform Hankie, Sledgehammer, Fist, Knife, Wrench.

Specifies that the item is a projectile/ranged weapon.
Examples: Freeze Ray, Laser Gun, Pistol, Oil Container, Fire Extinguisher.

Specifies that the item is a thrown weapon.
Examples: Land Mine, Grenade, Toss, Molotov Cocktail, Shuriken.

Specifies that the item is something useful, that does not fall under any other type.
Examples: Safe Cracking Tool, Necronomicon, Hypnotizer II, Kill Profiter, Cube of Lampey.

Specifies that the item can be combined with other items.
Examples: Food Processor, Armor Durability Doubler, Accuracy Mod, Identify Wand, Portable Sell-O-Matic.

The collection of item and trait categories used in the game. Use it to avoid typos.

The category for items, that are related to food.
Examples: Fud, Ham Sandwich, Bacon Cheeseburger, Banana, Mini Fridge.

The category for items, that are in some way related to drugs, or ingestable/inhalable non-drugs.
Examples: Syringe, Cocktail, Electro Pill, Rage Poison, Resurrection Shampoo, Antidote, Cologne.

The category for items, that are, or in some way related to, alcohol.
Examples: Beer, Whiskey.

The category for items, that are in some way related to health.
Examples: First Aid Kit, Blood Bag.

The category for items, that are in some way related to sex. Yeah, Matt added that for some reason.
Examples: Codpiece, Condom.

The category for items, that are in some way related to the technological/scientific progress.
Examples: Ammo Processor, Melee Durability Spray, Blindenizer, Drink Mixer, Monkey Barrel.
Also, for some reason, includes the Shapeshifter's Possession Stone.

The category for items, that are not usable directly, but usable in certain situations or on certain objects.
Examples: Lockpick, Window Cutter, Free Item Voucher, Door Detonator, Slave Helmet Remover.

The category for items, that work passively.
Examples: Money, Nugget, Quick Escape Teleporter, Translator, Cube of Lampey.

The category for items, that are usable directly.
Examples: Necronomicon, Fireworks, Walkie-Talkie, Cigarette Lighter, Cardboard Box.
Also includes Slave Helmet Remover for some reason.

The category for items, that are in some way related to magic, religion or occult.
Examples: Necronomicon, Mood Ring, Magic Lamp, Boo-Urn, Voodoo Doll.

The category for items, that are in some way related to weapons, weapon mods or armor.
Examples: Bear Trap, Crowbar, Rate of Fire Mod, Shotgun, Bracelet of Strength, Sticky Glove.

The category for items, that are considered to be "unusual" weapons, but capable of doing harm.
Examples: Rocket Launcher, Freeze Ray, Flamethrower, Shrink Ray, Ghost Gibber.

The category for items, that are considered to be "unusual" weapons, but usually harmless.
Examples: Water Cannon, Research Gun, Water Pistol, Fire Extinguisher, Tranquilizer Gun.

The category for items, that can be considered non-violent weapons.
Examples: Water Cannon, Banana Peel, EMP Grenade, Research Gun, Paralyzer Trap.
For some reason, includes Wrestler's Toss ability.

The category for items, that are not usually used to inflict harm (well, at least directly).
Examples: Oil Container, Research Gun.

The category for items, that affect or are affected by melee weapons in some way.
Examples: Melee Durability Spray.

The category for items, that affect or are affected by guns in some way.
Examples: Ammo Processor, Bulletproof Vest, Ammo Capacity Mod, Bomb Maker, Kill Ammunizer.

The category for... uh... everything, that can be found at the construction site? or a warehouse?.. Idk.
Examples: Safe Cracking Tool, First Aid Kit, Soldier Helmet, Augmentation Canister, Gas Mask, Hard Hat, Saw, Crowbar, Mini Fridge, Jackhammer, Lockpick, Blowtorch, Power Drill, Blood Bag, Cardboard Box, Cigarette Lighter, Chainsaw, Safe Buster, Matches, Rag, Shovel, Rope, Grappling Hook, Window Cutter, Wrench, Slave Helmet.

The category for items, that NPCs shouldn't be able to pick up and use against the player.
Examples: Freeze Ray, Laser Gun, Leaf Blower, Water Pistol, Tranquilizer Gun.

The category for different types of nuggets.
Examples: Chicken Nugget, Gold Nugget, Nougat, Nugget Hop, NuGet.

The category for different types of currency.
Examples: Chicken Nugget, Bottle Cap, United States Dollar, Bell, Simoleon.

The category for everything, that is in some way related to melee weapons.
Examples (items): Melee Durability Doubler, Bracelet of Strength, Kill Profiter, Electro Pill, Critter Upper.
Examples (traits): Harmless, Tank-Like, Increased Crit Chance, No In-Fighting, Wall Walloper.

The category for everything, that is in some way related to guns, ammo and sometimes explosives.
Examples (items): Ammo Processor, Kill Profiter, Ammo Capacity Mod, Ammo Stealer, Bomb Maker.
Examples (traits): Big Bullets, Blaster Survivor, Ammo Scavenger, No In-Fighting, Burning Bullets.

The category for everything, that is in some way related to social interaction.
Examples (items): Necronomicon, Haterator, Drink Mixer, Cocktail, Slave Helmet Remover, Body Swapper.
Examples (traits): Class Solidarity, Clumsiness Forgiven, Low-Cost Jobs, Disturbing Facial Expressions, Share the Health.

The category for everything, that is in some way related to stealth.
Examples (items): Safe Buster, Haterator, EMP Grenade, Boombox, Silencer.
Examples (traits): Backstabber, Blends In Nicely, Secret Vandalizer, Intrusion Artist, Honor Among Thieves.

The category for everything, that is in some way related to movement.
Examples (items): Quick Escape Teleporter, Sugar, Antidote.
Examples (traits): Skinny Nerdlinger, Kneecapper, Roller Skates, Slippery Target, Bulky.

The category for everything, that is in some way related to defense.
Examples (items): Armor Durability Doubler, Quick Escape Teleporter, Mini Fridge, Kill Healthenizer, Resurrection Shampoo.
Examples (traits): I'm Outtie, Un-Crits, Fireproof Skin, Medical Professional, Disturbing Facial Expressions.

The category for everything, that is in some way related to trading.
Examples (items): Free Item Voucher, Cube of Lampey, Portable Sell-O-Matic, Hiring Voucher.
Examples (traits): Drug-a-lug, Shrewd Negotiator, Moocher, Shop Drops, Banana Lover.

The category for traits, that are non-beneficial to the agent that has these traits.
Examples: Corruption Costs, Bodyguard, No Teleports, Fair Game, Sausage Fingers.
The collection of useful hook-related extension methods.
